DOC.brief_summary: The experimental model is a semi-acute, over-night, study where the purpose is to evaluate food factors related to colonially derived regulation and satiety in healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Over-night Effect of Dietary Fiber on Glucose Metabolism and Satiety
DOC.criteria: Normal fasting blood glucose BMI 1925 kg/m2 Gastrointestinal diseases Food allergies e.g. lactose, gluten intolerance Metabolic disorder e.g. diabetes Tobacco/snuff users No antibiotic or probiotic intake 2 weeks prior and during study. Vegetarians
